_header: She saw these women all bedene
Subjects: women, praise of; carols, of women
_description: A song in praise of women — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: Pray we to oure lady dere / For here holy grace

CamStJohn259.First Lines:
Sche saw þeis women all bedeneboth for sorow & fro
                    tene…
CamStJohn259.Last Lines:
…for false men þat downe hym trayþat þou sene
                    he neuer in face
CamStJohn259.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  G. C. Macaulay, eds.  
             “Fifteenth Century Carols and Other Pieces.” 
             Modern Language Review
         8 (1913): 68-87: 76-7.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 263; 1977, 233.
